resources.string: Already have an account? Log In
I have read through the privacy policy, terms and conditions to make a donation.
Would you like to receive the acknowledgement certificate

1.Length: Minimum 8 inches, measured from the cut to the tip.

 2.Condition: Clean, dry, and free of styling products; dyed or permed hair accepted.

 3.Packaging: Securely tie in a ponytail or braid; place in a zip-lock bag.

 4.Cutting Technique: Make a clean, straight cut; avoid split ends.

 5.Accepted Types: Straight, wavy, curly, and chemically unprocessed hair.

 6.Ineligible: No hair from the floor or brushes; no shaved heads or buzz cuts.

 7.Donation Process: Fill out the form on the app or website; follow mailing instructions.

 8.Post-Donation Care: Consider donating in a ponytail or braid for easier wig making.
Thank you for your generosity! Your hair donation at HairHarmony makes a meaningfulÂ difference.
Click on the above icon to take a pic and translate the sign language

OUR MISSION IS SIMPLE YET IMPACTFUL: WE CONNECT INDIVIDUALS WHO ARE READY TO SHARE THE GIFT OF HAIR WITH THOSE IN NEED. BY PARTNERING WITH TRUSTED ORGANIZATIONS, WE ENSURE THAT YOUR DONATED HAIR IS CRAFTED INTO HIGH-QUALITY WIGS, PROVIDING COMFORT AND HOPE TO THOSE GOING THROUGH CHALLENGING TIMES.

HAIRHARMONY IS MORE THAN JUST AN APP: IT'S A MOVEMENT THAT CELEBRATES THE BEAUTY OF GIVING. WHETHER YOU'RE GROWING YOUR HAIR FOR A CAUSE OR SEARCHING FOR A MEANINGFUL WAY TO CONTRIBUTE, OUR PLATFORM BRINGS TOGETHER LIKE-MINDED INDIVIDUALS WITH A SHARED PURPOSE.

JOIN US IN CREATING A HARMONIOUS BLEND OF BEAUTY AND BENEVOLENCE. TOGETHER, WE WEAVE A TAPESTRY OF COMPASSION, ONE STRAND AT A TIME. HAIRHARMONY WHERE YOUR GENEROSITY BECOMES A MELODY OF KINDNESS, RESONATING FAR BEYOND THE SURFACE.
WE\'RE HERE TO LISTEN AND CONNECT! AT HAIRHARMONY, YOUR THOUGHTS, QUESTIONS, AND SUGGESTIONS MATTER. FEEL FREE TO REACH OUT TO US ANYTIME, AND WE\'LL DO OUR BEST TO ASSIST YOU.
